stateDiagram

DISARMED

DISARMED : DISARMED

DISARMED : enter / #123; notify_disarmed()#59; #125;

ARMING

ARMING : ARMING

ARMING : enter / #123; init_arming_countdown()#59; #125;

ARMING : exit / #123; clear_countdown()#59; #125;

ARMED

ARMED : ARMED

ARMED : enter / #123; notify_armed()#59; #125;

ALARM_COUNTDOWN

ALARM_COUNTDOWN : ALARM_COUNTDOWN

ALARM_COUNTDOWN : enter / #123; init_alarm_countdown()#59; #125;

ALARM_COUNTDOWN : exit / #123; clear_countdown()#59; #125;

ALARM_ACTIVE

ALARM_ACTIVE : ALARM_ACTIVE

ALARM_ACTIVE : enter / #123; set_red_led(true)#59; #125;

ALARM_ACTIVE : enter / #123; notify_alarm()#59; #125;

ALARM_ACTIVE : exit / #123; set_red_led(false)#59; #125;

%% Initial state name as "." so that it fits in black circle shape.
%% See https://github.com/StateSmith/StateSmith/issues/404
state "." as ROOT.(InitialState)

DISARMED --> ARMING : ARM

ARMING --> ARMED : do [is_countdown_complete()]

ARMING --> DISARMED : DISARM

ARMED --> ALARM_COUNTDOWN : do [is_motion_detected()]

ARMED --> DISARMED : DISARM

ALARM_COUNTDOWN --> ALARM_ACTIVE : do [is_countdown_complete()]

ALARM_COUNTDOWN --> DISARMED : DISARM

ALARM_ACTIVE --> DISARMED : DISARM

ROOT.(InitialState) --> DISARMED
Events
settings
